email.subject: Notice: Please pay your balance
email.message:
Hello {field_562},

You have a balance for {field_809} ({field_811}). Your balance must be paid in order to attend the training.

INSTRUCTIONS TO PAY YOUR BALANCE:

Please log in to the STUDENT PORTAL at atlasproject.org (instructions below) and navigate to your training event under My Orders. If you owe a balance, there will be a Make Payment link that allows you to pay it by credit or debit card.

As a reminder, here is how to access your Student Portal:

  • https://www.atlasproject.org/student-dashboard/
  • Use your email address and password to log in
  • Enter your email address (the one this email was sent to)
  • Enter your password (use the FORGOT password link if you have forgotten yours; you will be sent an email with a reset link)

Thank you for your attention to this! We look forward to seeing you on training day.

We look forward to seeing you on training day.

If you have any questions, please dont hesitate to reach out.

Thank you,

Atlas

email.subject: Complete Your Pre-training Checklist
email.message:
{field_562},

Please complete your Pre-training Checklist for your Atlas {field_809} Training ({field_811}).

The checklist takes about 20 minutes to complete and depending on your answers to the Health Questionnaire, you may be required to complete a Health Professional Consent Form. This can take time, so we recommend you begin your Checklist now, well in advance of your training date.

Use the following link to log in to the Student Portal with your Student ID & temporary password you received by email when you first enrolled, or use the Forgot Password link to reset your password to something new.

https://www.atlasproject.org/student-dashboard

Thank you for your attention to this! Once your checklist is complete a member of our team will be scheduling your pre-training Preparation Call.

We look forward to seeing you on training day.

If you have any questions, please dont hesitate to reach out.

Thank you,

Atlas

info@atlasproject.org

Action Needed
Because you have been sober for less than one year, we can not recommend our workshops. Depending on your circumstance and in rare cases we may allow you to participate in Explore with less than one year sobriety. We will review your comments and call you to discuss. If you have not heard from us within 2 business days, please contact the office to discuss.

inputs.label: Training Venue
inputs.instructions: Updating an Event (Type = Training) Venue will also update the connected Training Event's venue.

inputs.copy:
Clicking the Generate Sub Events button below will create the appropriate number of Sub Events, based on the Training Type of the main Training Event.

Each Sub Event will be Pending, as a reminder to configure each Sub Event with the correct Start and End date/time. After configuring each Sub Event correctly, change its status to Active so that it will appear on the active Calendars.

The Generate Sub Events button is ONLY available when there are zero connected Sub Events. To use this feature again, you must first delete all Sub Events.
inputs.label: Important: Please Read

inputs.copy: Warning: Clicking Delete ALL Sub Events below will delete all the sub events connected to this training event. You can NOT undo this action.

email.subject: Atlas: Action Needed

email.message:
{field_1368},

A new Atlas student account has been created for you. Wed like to acknowledge the steps you took in saying yes to your life and the possibilities you see for yourself.


Login to your account here:

https://www.atlasproject.org/student-dashboard/


Your student login information is:

Your ID: {field_1369}

Your Password: {field_1371}

We recommend changing your password upon logging into your account for the first time.


Prior to attending the training all students must:

  1. Complete their student Checklist
  2. Complete a pre-training Preparation Call with an Atlas team member (they will be reaching out to you directly by text)
  3. Pay any outstanding balance due

We look forward to seeing you on training day.


If you have any questions, please dont hesitate to reach out.


Thank you,

Atlas
